publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1560 Nicola Sturgeon: Public Health Etc. (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Public Health etc. (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Shona Robison*, Stewart Maxwell*
